com.n9mtq4.botclient

Class Game

  • com.n9mtq4.botclient.Game

  • public class Game

    An object for the currently running game.

    Created by will on 11/24/15 at 3:14 PM.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      An object for the currently running game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void endTurn(ControllableBot controllableBot)
      Ends your turn and writes the actions that your bot has done this turn to a file
      java.lang.String getCurrentCompliance()
      The compliance level that this client is running at
      java.lang.String getServerVersion()
      The version of the server this client is connected to.
      int getTeam()
      Your team number. So far it is either 1 or 2
      ControllableBot invoke()
      Kotlin method. Allows getting the bot like:
      ControllableBot waitForTurn()
      Halts, waiting for input through the socket when it receives the Start turn command, it makes a bot for that turn and returns it

    • Method Detail

      • getServerVersion

        public java.lang.String getServerVersion()

        The version of the server this client is connected to.

        "ruby" or "kotlin API_LEVEL" ex: "ruby", "kotlin 1", "kotlin 2"

      • getTeam

        public int getTeam()

        Your team number. So far it is either 1 or 2

      • getCurrentCompliance

        public java.lang.String getCurrentCompliance()

        The compliance level that this client is running at

      • invoke

        public ControllableBot invoke()

        Kotlin method. Allows getting the bot like:

        val game = Game()val bot = game()

      • waitForTurn

        public ControllableBot waitForTurn()

        Halts, waiting for input through the socket when it receives the Start turn command, it makes a bot for that turn and returns it

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn(ControllableBot controllableBot)

        Ends your turn and writes the actions that your bot has done this turn to a file
